positive.valid_data: when user input corect data then user got response 200
positive.different_name: when user input different name and same code then user got response 200
positive.different_desc: when user input different description and same code and same name then user got response 200
positive.different_code: when user input different code and same description and same name then user got response 200

negative.wrong_serviceGroup: when user input data using invalid service group, then user got response error
